text.en: Mother of Space, foremost of ḍākinīs, Lady Kharchen Za,
Gatherer of the secret treasury of Padmākara,
text.en-trans: dü sum künkhyen pema jungné kyi

text.en: Knower of all past, present and future:
Mother Tsogyal, Great Bliss Queen, to you we pray: grant us siddhis, ordinary and supreme!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so choktün ngödrub tsol
